name: Saga Kingdoms
blurb: Saga Kingdoms is a revolutionary MMORTS, focusing on questing and empire building.

rewards.reward: New reward level for anyone who wants to keep up to date on Saga Kingdoms development
As a special thank you, all contributors at this level and up will receive a set of Kickstarter exclusive flag runes flown by their nations, buildings and units.

A kickstarter Emerald archer unit to show everyone that you helped make this project a reality. Emerald troops have the same stats as regular troops for fairness but have an awesome particle effect, begin at the elite experience level and heal 8 times faster after battle. A $15 store credit when the game launches, an invite to play in the closed beta and access to the beta forums.
A unit of Emerald archers and Emerald swordsmen. $30 store credit, an invite to play in the closed beta and access to the beta forums.
Early Supporter: A unit of Emerald swordsmen, Emerald archers and Emerald heavy cavalry. $75 store credit, an invite to play in the closed beta and access to the beta forums for you and a friend.

All three Emerald units, $100 store credit. Plus your harbor will be protected by four emerald towers with a menacing particle effect warning potential invaders that this island may belong to someone they do not want to mess with. Access to closed beta and the forums for you and a friend.

Dragon Tier - All three Emerald units, $140 store credit plus an elder dragon hero, this is a rare hero unit. We\u2019re not going to give him Emerald status because that would be a little over the top, he is badass enough. Access to closed beta and the forums for you and two friends.

All Dragon tier rewards, $300 store credit, plus to show your friends how awesome you are we will name a quest boss in the game after you, or a loved one. (no offensive names, we\u2019ve seen pet names that may not be appropriate for our younger audiences). Access to closed beta and the forums for you and two friends.

All Dragon tier rewards, $375 store credit (good luck trying to spend this much), plus we will send you a form to design and name your own hero unit. This will be a rare hero who will be placed somewhere in the game world or in boosters for players to randomly find but you will get one right away, plus you can choose four friends who also get one just to show them how awesome you are. All five of you will also be invited to the beta.

All Dragon tier rewards, $750 credit (now it's just silly) plus we will work with you designing a hero unit. No  forms, the abilities are only limited by your imagination, and game balance. (as long as we can code it and it\u2019s not offensive). This hero will never be found in boosters, he or she will be ultra rare only found in a highest level quest but you and 4 friends of your choosing get him right away. All 5 of you will also be invited into beta.

All Dragon tier rewards, $750 credit, the custom hero, plus we will work with you to design one of the major boss encounters in the game, the boss will then be named after you. This does mean you will know the secrets to this bosses mechanics and the loot he holds, but we trust you not to tell. You will also get credit as a jr. game designer on Saga Kingdoms and invite to beta for you and four friends.

All Dragon tier rewards, a hoard of credits, the custom hero, plus we will craft a mighty statue in your likeness that will stand watch over the PvP arena we plan for patch 2.0, or sooner if our stretch goal is met. You and a friend of your choosing will also get ten of every troop (not heroes) available in the game at launch and our undying gratitude.

If you are a movie buff this reward level is for you. All Dragon tier rewards, a hoard of credits, the custom hero, plus you will be invited to spend an afternoon on the slopes in Park City Utah with Jason Faller. The man with the vision for Saga, former professor of movie production at BYU and producer on more than a dozen indie films. We\u2019ll pick up lunch and ski tickets for you and a friend but you are responsible for travel and lodging.

All Dragon tier rewards, the custom hero, a hoard of credits, plus you will be listed as an executive producer on Saga Kingdoms. We will also craft a mighty statue that will stand guard over one of three king of the kill maps we plan for patch 2.0 or sooner if our stretch goal is met.You and three friends will also get ten of every troop (not heroes) available in the game at launch and our undying gratitude.
